description:
Hit the road in comfort. This modern jersey combines stretch mesh panels with smooth wicking fabric. Designed with the same one-piece sleeves used on Catelli’s premium race kit, the Entrata is incredibly comfortable in all riding positions.

  • Prosecco GT fabric wicks moisture for optimal breathability and comfort
  • Air mesh, one-piece sleeves are cool comfortable and hug the body
  • Raw-cut edges on the sleeves make it easy to layer arm warmers
  • Gripped hem with a drop tail provides good coverage
  • Full length YKK® Vislon zipper lets you vent
  • 3 back drop-in pockets have extra stretch panels
  • Reflective details
name: Castelli Entrata VI Jersey - Men's
